routes.name: Snuffy Smith
routes.description: A knob and edge climb on a small pinnacle with a contrived start and enjoyable face climb finish

routes.name: Taiwan On
routes.description: An enjoyable arete climb with tricky moves and a crux near the fourth bolt

routes.name: No Golf Shoes
routes.description: This route gets most of it's rating from it's difficult bouldery start.

routes.name: Tuff It Out
routes.description: A bouldery start on a honeycomb overhang then on to easy moves on low quality rock

routes.name: Pack Animal Direct
routes.description: This route gets most of it's rating from it's difficult bouldery start.
